Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 1 Tika, Hetuduka » 1.20 Ajjhattattika, Hetuduka » 1.20.2 Nahetupada » 1.20.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Ārammaṇa
Tika, Hetuduka
Ajjhattattika, Hetuduka
Nahetupada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Ārammaṇa
229.
868Ajjhatto nahetu dhammo ajjhattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ajjhatto nahetu dhammo bahiddhā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
869Bahiddhā nahetu dhammo bahiddhā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Bahiddhā nahetu dhammo ajjhattassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
230.
870Ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare dve…pe…  sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte āsevane kamme vipāke dve, āhāre cha, indriye…pe…  vippayutte dve…pe…  avigate cha. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
871Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
872Ārammaṇapaccayā nahetuyā cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
873Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
874(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup1.21 Ajjhattārammaṇattika, Hetuduka >>
